title: @KateyKhaos Why is Blight Crystal Varus not going on sale in September?????
body:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Arh3w_1KfCECdEl3UUUyZ0pFSFBWcmpaTDVfa1lBUGc#gid=0

As of 8/18, Blight Crystal Varus has not been on sale FOR A LEAGUE RECORD OF 644 DAYS, MORE THAN ANY OTHER SKIN ELIGIBLE FOR A SALE EVER. This easily trumps 2nd place, being Piltover Customs Blitzcrank with 588, almost a 2 MONTH DIFFERENCE. And PC Blitz is going on sale in september , yet BC Varus isn't. What is going on here, I really reaaaaaaaaaaaally want that skin and have just enough to buy it on sale, yet for some reason it isn't going on sale within the next moonth, even though it already broke the record for longest time without a sale. Is there a reason this skin isn't going on sale, like you are updating its particles, or did you guys just forget about it?? Ty in advance.
